channel.title: S15 - Season of the Lost on
channel.description: Recent content in S15 - Season of the Lost on

item.title: Fractethyst
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. Fractethyst is a Precision Frame (65 RPM) Stasis Shotgun, introduced in Season 15. The best roundup I’ve seen is courtesy of Castle Content, and much of what you’ll see here is recapped from his review. PvP Thoughts Finally a replacement for the fallen king of Destiny Shotguns Dust Rock Blues! Fractethyst will round out your Kinetic slot shotgun suite and will do it in style, with some super interesting new perks.

item.title: Iota Draconis
Vulpecula
item.description: For complete perks, see d2gunsmith.com, light.gg or destinytracker.com. Vulpecula is a 180 RPM Kinetic Stasis Hand Cannon, introduced in Season of the Lost (S15). If you’re confused and barely able to pronounce the names of the Season 15 weapons, so am I! Fortunately, the Sliflist is here to help. From Wikipedia: Vulpecula /v ålÀàp…õkj äl…ô/ is a faint constellation in the northern sky. Its name is Latin for “little fox”, although it is commonly known simply as the fox.
